Spatial P in English
Peter Svenonius
October 2008
 

A detailed investigation of the syntax and semantics of spatial prepositions in English, arguing for an articulated functional structure.
Format: [ pdf ]
Reference: lingbuzz/000078
(please use that when you cite this article)
Published in: To appear in Cartography of Syntactic Structures, vol. 6, edited by Guglielmo Cinque and Luigi Rizzi (Oxford University Press)
